title: Constructing Polyamide/Ceramic Composite Membranes for Highly Efficient and Selective Separation towards Dye/salt Solution

Membrane separation technology has been recognized as an effective approach to remove dyes from dyeing wastewater that are crucial for improving the quality of pigmentation effect in the printing and...
